summary: Mary Crow Dog, daughter of a desperately poor Indian family in South Dakota, is swept up in the protests of the 1960s and becomes sensitized to the injustices that society inflicts on her ... See full summary Â»
cast: Charles Abourezk|Dave Bald Eagle|Lawrence Bayne|Edgar Bear Runner|Irene Bedard|Ron Beebe|Nathan Bison|Kathy Burnett|Vic Camp|Casey Camp-Horinek|Tantoo Cardinal|Wi-Waste-Win Conroy|Amy Moore Davis|Jonathan Gill|Irene Handren-Seals|James Hatzell|Dora Hernandez|Pato Hoffmann|Mekashi Horinek|Michael Horse|Owen LeBeau|Dawn Little Sky|Reno Lodge|Angel McFarland|Virginia Mercado|Eliza Morrison|Dean Norris|Mary Olquin|Nancy Parsons|Julia Recountre|Lois Red Elk|Norman Roach|George Marshall Ruge|Joseph Runningfox|Claudette Sabor|Tim Sampson|August Schellenberg|Michael Spears|Don Strong|Richard Swallow|Melanie Two Eagle|Floyd 'Red Crow' Westerman|Jessica White-Plume|Richard Ray Whitman|Myra 'Dakota' Bown|Peter Weller
title: Lakota Woman: Siege at Wounded Knee
